{{ddcl | since=c++23 |
const_reference operator[]( size_type pos ) const;
}}

Returns a reference to the entry at specified location {{tt|pos}}. No bounds checking is performed.

If {{tt|pos}} is not within the range of the stacktrace, i.e. {{c|1=pos &gt;= size()}}, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | pos | position of the stacktrace entry to return}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Reference to the requested entry.

===Exceptions===
Throws nothing.

===Complexity===
Constant.
